{"step_by_step_thinking": "Etanercept is a TNF inhibitor and is used in the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis. Leflunomide is a DMARD and is also used in the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis. Methotrexate is a DMARD and is the first-line treatment for rheumatoid arthritis. Febuxostat is a medication that is used to lower levels of uric acid in people with gout, not rheumatoid arthritis.", "answer_choice": "C"}
